column4: so installing Ubuntu will not affect the os already installed, do i need 2 set up a partition or anything?
im sorry i mean, i can just dl the installer, and away ubuntu goes, adn i do not have 2 do any sys prep like a partition or anyghing?
back up your data on the other system first. :)
if you don't have any data on a fresh install of windows, don't worry, just go for it. you can reinstall the vista if it messes up, then reinstall grub to get the linux back. after
